import React, { useState } from 'react' import Uno from '../images/1.jpg'; import Dos from '../images/2.png'; import Tres from '../images/3.png'; import firebaseApp from '../credenciales'; import {getAuth, createUserWithEmailAndPassword, signInWithEmailAndPassword} from 'firebase/auth'; const auth = getAuth(firebaseApp) const Login = () =>{ const [registro, setRegistro] = useState(false) const handlerSubmit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const email = e.target.email.value; const password = e.target.password.value; if(registro){ await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password) } } return (
{/* en esta secciÃ³n serÃ¡ el formulario */}

{registro ? 'Sign up': 'Log in'}

setRegistro(!registro)}>
) } export default Login
